bug.author: vishalbollu
bug.summary: Name of api auto-generated by cx init has underscore
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Description</denchmark-h>
API names can not have underscores. cx init produces apis.yaml with example template: <denchmark-code>## Sample API: # # - kind: api # name: my_api # model_name: my_model # compute: # replicas: 1 </denchmark-code>
Change underscore to hyphen
